articles.title: These two 19-year-olds scaled Zepto into a $900 million company in nine months - Business Insider India
articles.description: Quick commerce startup Zepto — founded by two 19-year-old Stanford dropouts nine months ago — is now valued at a whopping $900 million. The company, on Monday night, announced that it has raised $200 million.
